title: Non-breaking period/full stop?
content:
Hi  
I'm wondering if there's such a thing as a non-breaking period/full stop. My e-mail address is [firstname.surname@company.com](mailto:firstname.surname@company.com) and it looks really ugly over a line break because I end up with my first name at the end of one line and my surname at the start of the next line.  
Is there a non-breaking period or some other way to get InDesign to keep the whole thing together?  
Thanks :)
author: Bendy

comments.content:
Hi Ben,  
there’s the ‘No Break’ attribute. You can assign it via the fly-out menu of the Character palette (or via a character style).  
F
Thanks Florian :) That's something I hadn't spotted!
